activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.EventActivity
activities.summary: The EventActivity is used for creating or editing calendar events. It allows users to set event details such as title, location, description, start and end times, recurrence rules, reminders, availability, attendees, and event type. It supports both local and CalDAV-based events, enabling features like time zone selection, color customization, and sharing of events.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.WidgetMonthlyConfigureActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: holds individual day number views in the monthly calendar widget configuration UI.
displays a background image or highlight for a specific day, currently hidden by default.
shows the numeric representation of a day in the monthly calendar widget configuration.
acts as the root layout managing coordination between child views like floating action buttons and app bars.
holds the main configuration UI elements with centered horizontal alignment and margin padding.
includes and displays the fragment layout for the monthly calendar configuration.
opens a color picker dialog to select the background color for the widget.
allows the user to modify the alpha (transparency) value of the background color.
opens a color picker dialog to select the text color for the widget.
saves the selected background and text color configurations, updates the widget, and closes the activity.
navigates to the previous month in the monthly calendar configuration view.
shows the current month name at the top navigation bar of the calendar configuration.
navigates to the next month in the monthly calendar configuration view.

activities.summary: This activity is used for configuring the appearance and settings of a monthly calendar widget. It allows users to customize background and text colors, adjust transparency via a SeekBar, dynamically displays the current month's calendar view, and saves the configuration changes.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.MainActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: refreshes the current calendar view and reloads events, especially useful in daily/weekly/monthly views.
acts as background dimming overlay when extended FAB menu is shown.
triggers creation of a new calendar event when the extended FAB is visible.
triggers creation of a new task when the extended FAB is visible.
opens extended FloatingActionButton menu allowing creation of new events or tasks depending on user interaction.
filters calendar events based on selected event types dynamically without leaving the current view.
displays instructional text indicating that no matching events were found during the search.
navigates to the detail view of the clicked event or task.

activities.summary: MainActivity serves as the main interface of a calendar application, allowing users to manage events, birthdays, anniversaries, holidays, and tasks. It supports multiple calendar views (daily, weekly, monthly, yearly), handles user interactions, swipe-to-refresh, quick filtering by event type, dynamic app shortcuts, and integrates with CalDAV for syncing remote calendars.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.EventTypePickerActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used to allow the user to pick between creating an 'Event' or a 'Task', presenting a dialog with two radio options. Depending on the selection, it launches the corresponding intent and finishes itself.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.SnoozeReminderActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used for snoozing reminders, which includes showing a dialog to pick a snooze duration and rescheduling the reminder based on the selected time.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.TaskActivity
activities.summary: The TaskActivity is responsible for creating, editing, and managing calendar tasks. It supports functionalities like setting task titles, descriptions, dates, times, reminders, repetition rules (daily, weekly, monthly, yearly), event types, and colors. The activity also handles recurring task modifications, duplication, deletion, saving with validation, and UI updates based on user input or state changes.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.WidgetListConfigureActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used for configuring the appearance and behavior of a calendar app widget. It allows users to customize background color, text color, transparency via SeekBar, select a time period for event display (e.g., today, week, month, year, or custom), previews event lists, saves configurations, and updates the corresponding widget instance.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.SimpleActivity
activities.summary: The SimpleActivity serves as a foundational activity in the application, providing utility methods for handling app icons, notifications, CalDAV calendar synchronization, and permission management. It supports dynamic icon switching, notification availability checks, background calendar syncing via CalDAV, and observer registration control to manage resource usage efficiently.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.ManageEventTypesActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Triggers the dialog to edit or view the selected event type.
Shows the title of the event type in the RecyclerView item.
Displays the color associated with the event type.
Displays an overflow menu icon (currently non-interactive).
Provides an anchor for displaying context menus related to the event type.

activities.summary: This activity is used to manage event types, allowing users to view, add, and delete event types. It includes functionality for displaying a list of event types in a RecyclerView, showing dialogs for editing or adding new event types, and handling deletion with appropriate restrictions related to CalDAV calendars.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.SettingsActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: allows users to customize app colors through another activity or dialog.
opens widget color customization settings for adjusting appearance of calendar widgets.
enables/disables English-only display language regardless of system settings.
launches device-specific language selection intent for localized app experience.
navigates to ManageEventTypesActivity for managing custom event types.
displays SelectEventTypesDialog to configure quick filter event types.
shows RadioGroupDialog allowing users to select the first day of the week.
switches between 12-hour and 24-hour time format globally in the app.
enables/disables weekend highlighting on certain calendar views.
opens a color picker dialog to change the highlight color for weekends.
launches notification customization intent if Android Oreo or higher is used.
triggers a dialog to select or remove a custom reminder sound.
presents audio stream options (alarm, notification, etc.) for reminder playback.
enables/disables vibration during reminder notifications.
configures whether reminders loop until dismissed.
uses the same snooze duration across all reminders when enabled.
allows setting a default snooze duration via a custom dialog.
enables/disables CalDAV calendar synchronization after permission checks.
activates pull-to-refresh gesture support for synced calendars.
displays SelectCalendarsDialog to manage which calendars are synced with CalDAV.
lets users choose the default start time for new events from predefined options or a custom time.
sets the default event duration using CustomIntervalPickerDialog.
selects the default event type to use when creating new events.
uses the last set of reminders as default for new events when enabled.

static_properties.text: Use the last events\' reminders as the default for new events

dynamic_properties.effect: configures the first default reminder time for events.
sets the second default reminder time for events.
defines the third default reminder time for events.
configures the starting hour for daily events shown in weekly view.
shows midnight-spanning events at the top bar in weekly view when enabled.

static_properties.text: Show events spanning across midnight at the top bar

dynamic_properties.effect: allows users to customize the number of days displayed in multi-day views.
starts the current week view with today’s date when enabled.

static_properties.text: Start week with the current day

dynamic_properties.effect: displays week numbers in monthly calendar views when activated.
shows a grid overlay in monthly calendar views when enabled.
sets how long past events remain visible in event lists.
controls visibility of descriptions or locations in event lists.
replaces event description text with location information when enabled.
adjusts the global font size across the app using a configuration dialog.
chooses which view opens when interacting with event list widgets.

static_properties.text: View to open from the event list widget

dynamic_properties.effect: dims past events visually in the calendar UI when enabled.
enables/disables changing event time zones during event creation/editing.
deletes all stored events and tasks after confirmation.
permits or restricts task creation within the app.
dims completed tasks visually in the UI when enabled.
enables/disables automatic backup scheduling based on device OS version.
manages scheduled automatic backups through a dedicated dialog.
exports calendar events to an ICS file using system file picker or legacy storage permissions.
imports calendar events from an ICS file by launching a file picker intent.
exports current app settings into a file for backup or transfer purposes.
imports previously exported settings from a file to restore preferences.

static_properties.text: Use the last events\' reminders as the default for new events
Show events spanning across midnight at the top bar
Start week with the current day
View to open from the event list widget

activities.summary: The SettingsActivity provides a user interface for configuring various aspects of the calendar application, including color customization, general settings, reminders, CalDAV synchronization, event defaults, weekly and monthly view options, widget settings, event/task management, backups, and import/export functionalities.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.SelectTimeZoneActivity

dynamic_properties.effect: Hosts the AppBarLayout and RecyclerView, providing coordination behavior for app bar interactions.
Holds the toolbar with navigation and menu options.
Displays the toolbar with menu items including the SearchView; handles navigation icon and menu inflation.
Selects a time zone and finishes the activity, returning the selected time zone as a result.

activities.summary: This activity is used for selecting a time zone. It displays a list of time zones in a RecyclerView, allows users to search and filter the list by country name using a SearchView, and returns the selected time zone when clicked.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.SplashActivity
activities.summary: The SplashActivity is typically used as a starting screen for the application, which might display initial information or perform initialization tasks before navigating to other activities.

activities.name: com.simplemobiletools.calendar.pro.activities.WidgetDateConfigureActivity
activities.summary: This activity is used to configure the appearance of a date widget, including background color, text color, and transparency settings. It allows users to customize colors via dialogs, adjust background transparency using a SeekBar, dynamically updates UI colors, saves configuration changes, and broadcasts a widget update.
